document.full_text: at least 13 people were killed and 15 wounded when a suicide bomber detonated a car in iraq's central city of tikrit on monday, the second attack in three days in the hometown of the late saddam hussein, officials said.
document.title: suicide car bomber kills 13 in saddam's hometown
lines_and_colors: at least 13 people were killed and 15 wounded when a suicide bomber detonated a car in iraq's central city of tikrit on monday, the second attack in three days in the hometown of the late saddam hussein, officials said.
